description:
Cool and modern apartment in the heart of Astoria with a balcony. Surrounded by great bars and restaurants, half block walk to subway, 4 stops from midtown Manhattan. One bed sleeps two, comfortable couch sleeps one. Great location.

The building is a new construction with modern amenities. There is a laundry room on the lobby level that is available. If you need recommendations on things to do in the area or in NYC in general, I can definitely help with some suggestions.
name: Modern style apartment with balcony in Astoria
review: Mash was a great host I would definitely recommend his spot. Bed and couch was super comfortable and the place was very clean.
